const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-index",
  mappings: {
    _source: {
      excludes: ["content_embedding"],
    },
    properties: {
      content_embedding: {
        type: "sparse_vector",
      },
      content: {
        type: "text",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
